-  byMoving 

Type Property# byMoving

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
static var byMoving: NSFileVersion.AddingOptions { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSFileVersion/AddingOptions/byMoving#Discussion)

When adding a file, you can specify this option if you want to create the version by moving the source file to the specified location.
